io.gearpump.streaming.state.api

Interface PersistentState<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MonoidState, NonWindowState, WindowState

    public interface PersistentState<T>
    PersistentState is part of the transaction API

    Users could get transaction support from the framework by conforming to PersistentState APIs and extending PersistentTask to manage the state

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] checkpoint()
      get a binary snapshot of state usually invoked by the framework
      scala.Option<T> get()
      unwrap the raw value of state

      recover state to a previous checkpoint usually invoked by the framework
      void setNextCheckpointTime(long timeStamp)
      set next checkpoint time should be invoked by the framework
      void update(long timestamp, T t)
      update state on a new message this is invoked by user
